content1.text: WOMBO is the world's best AI-powered lip sync app. Take a selfie, pick a song, and let WOMBO work its magic. All you have to do is add a selfie, pick a song, and let WOMBO work its magic. The result? Videos that are hilarious, bizarre, fun, and ready to go viral. No singing lessons required. How to use the app that went viral for 'bringing life' to selfies

content2.text: First of all you have to make sure that your Mobile Data OR wifi is activated . Second just press the Green install Button Bellow and after is will redirect you to the wombo app  and just press Install  and wait intill the the install progress app and finally open the App and enjoy

content3.text: 1 - Install the application on your phone, it is available for operating systems Android e iOS;2 - Click on the Let's go! Option;Print from the Wombo AI appWombo AI “gives life” to selfies. Image: Olhar Digital3 - Authorize Wombo to have access to the device's camera and gallery;Print from the Wombo AI appThe application will ask for authorization to access device data. Image: Olhar Digital4 - Take your selfie, or choose a photo from the gallery;Print from the Wombo AI appFrame your face on the dotted line. Image: Olhar Digital5 - Click on the green button to choose your voice acting;Print from the Wombo AI appThe user can take photos or choose a file from the gallery. Image: Olhar Digital6 - After choosing the dubbing, click on the platform symbol again;Print from the Wombo AI appChoose which dubbing you want to perform. Image: Olhar Digital7 - Choose whether to save the video to your gallery or share it with your friends.Print from the Wombo AI appThe user can save the content in the gallery. Image: Olhar DigitalReady! Now you know and know how to use the Wombo AI app to bring your selfies to life.

content4.text: With each passing day a new application it ends up becoming a 'fever' on the internet all of a sudden. The darling of the moment is Wombo AI, an app that brings photos to life, more specifically, selfies, those clicks of the face. The tool animates the photos by offering voiceovers of songs and dances.

content5.text: In the past few days, videos have gained a lot of popularity in several social networks and even left some netizens confused. The most famous videos were made with celebrities and politicians and generated a lot of laughter. Many users have compared Wombo's fame with the Faceapp, which transformed photos of a woman into a man and vice versa

content6.text:
If you are using an android phone for quite some time, you must have encountered errors related to android ui while installing an app, or after you performed a system UI update at least once, the error goes something like this: Unfortunately, System UI has stopped .The error is very common and can have various causes.

This error is also very common with your android operating system update and upgrades, you must have seen errors like, system ui kitkat error, unfortunately system ui has stopped marshmallow or error lollipop system ui could not be updated.
